text: Alam Tara 'Ila Al-Ladhina Qila Lahum Kuffu 'Aydiyakum Wa 'Aqimu As-Salaata Wa 'Atu Az-Zakaata Falamma Kutiba `Alayhimu Al-Qitalu 'Idha Fariqun Minhum Yakhshawna An-Nasa Kakhashyati Allahi 'Aw 'Ashadda Khashyatan Wa Qalu Rabbana Lima Katabta `Alayna Al-Qitala Lawla 'Akhkhartana 'Ila 'Ajalin Qaribin Qul Mata`u Ad-Dunya Qalilun Wa Al-'Akhiratu Khayrun Limani Attaqa Wa La Tuzlamuna Fatilaan
